reviewText:
When I found this tape on Amazon I was so excited! I had grown up with it as a small child, and I have been searching for these wonderful videos since shortly after my wife and I found out we were expecting our now 2-year-old daughter.
Our little girl adores this tape, with it's fun and creative music and funny segments in-between songs.

I couldn't be happier with this purchase! Thank you, play-a-game!
